transcript: Hello, this is an urgent message from your bank. Your account has been compromised. Please verify your details by pressing 1.
Congratulations! You've won a prize! To claim your prize, please call back immediately. This is an urgent offer.
Hi, just calling to check on your account activity. We noticed some unusual transactions. Please confirm your identity.
Your account has been flagged for suspicious activity. Please contact us to resolve this issue.
This is a security alert. Your account has been compromised. Please enter your account number to proceed.
